meanings.definition: A person who is not a fan of something.
meanings.sent1: The nonfan decided not to attend the concert.
meanings.sent2: She became a nonfan of the band after hearing their new album.
meanings.sent3: The nonfan jokingly said they would rather clean their room than watch the game.
meanings.sent4: His sister was a nonfan of horror movies, finding them too scary.
meanings.sent5: The nonfan's dislike for spicy food was well-known among their friends.

meanings.definition: Not being a fan of something.
meanings.sent1: The nonfan opinion about the movie was clear from the start.
meanings.sent2: She had a nonfan reaction to the idea of going on a roller coaster.
meanings.sent3: The nonfan expression on his face made it obvious he didn't enjoy the play.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfan attitude towards sports made her stand out in a group of enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The nonfan response to the book was lukewarm at best.
